ygData.subject: Re: Hello All
ygData.msgSnippet: Su, Is there a website where you can see what equipment you mix with what aug stone to get certain enhancements? I have some sort of cloudy ruby that I got
ygData.messageBody:
Su,
Is there a website where you can see what equipment you mix with what
aug stone to get certain enhancements? I have some sort of cloudy
ruby that I got from my first adventure. I hear that I take it to a
birdfeeder looking think in the camp but I have no idea which pieces
of my equipment I can augment and what the augmentation does.

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Su <suceress@d...> wrote:
> When the weather is better and I have a stable 'net connection I'll
try
> another dungeon crawl. As it is I have failed 4 or 5 times because
of
> running out of time.
> The first dungeon crawl I did we made over 100pp each. Second one I
got a
> wisdom augmentation stone. Even though we didn't succeed we still
had fun.
> I hope that I can get grouped with some guildies sometime though.
> luv,
> -Su
